name: Wild [Text RPG]
description:
OId school text RPG game written on Qbasic 7.1 for MS-DOS. To play it you need to run it under MS-DOS or use an MS-DOS emulator like DOS-BOX. You can download DOS-BOX for free on the internet. 

If you know BASIC [Qbasic] and want to colaborate with this open source txt RPG game on GitHub, this is the link to the public repository: 

https://github.com/fgr101/WIld-basic

#retro #survival #textadventure #strategy #msdos #homebrew #opensource
